about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey to survive and thrive in a prehistoric world! In this unique blend of survival, exploration, and strategy, you’ll guide your tribe through the harsh realities of the ancient past. Gather resources, hunt dangerous predators, and farm crops to sustain your people as you build and expand your settlement.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Survival Challenges: Face fierce predators like tigers, crocodiles, and bears, each with unique behaviors and loot.

  • Resource Management: Gather vital materials, farm crops, and trade resources to ensure your tribe’s growth.

  • Technological Advancement: Unlock tools and technologies from basic fire to advanced shelters and defenses, shaping your tribe’s evolution.

  • Colony Building: Construct and customize your settlement, balancing functionality and aesthetics to create a thriving community.

  • Engaging Exploration: Wander through diverse landscapes filled with hidden resources, mysterious caves, and ancient secrets.

  • Rich Economy: Harvest, trade, and manage resources like meat, leather, and crafted goods to progress your tribe.

  • Strategic Depth: Plan your tribe’s expansion, defend against threats, and ensure their survival through careful decision-making.

Whether you’re crafting tools, managing your colony, or battling the wild, your choices will determine the fate of your tribe. Are you ready to lead your people through the ages? A world of survival, strategy, and discovery awaits!

name: Stone Age

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Survive and thrive in a prehistoric world! Hunt fierce predators, gather resources, farm crops, and unlock advanced technology to build your colony. Face dynamic challenges, craft tools, and trade for progress. A rich blend of survival, exploration, and strategy awaits!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Bosnian, Hebrew
